about.title: Computational Multiphysics Research Lab
about.description: We model complex flows and materials across scales and speeds, combining physics-based simulation and AI to solve challenges in aerospace, defense, energy, and bioinspired systems.

contact.address: Room No. 138, Department of Aerospace Engineering, IIT Madras, Chennai - 600036.
